Reviews.Title: Q1C1 DVR with Cameras, So good ,I will buy  second set
Reviews.Author: Thomas R. "john"
Reviews.Content: I was surprised with my new DVR kit. Hook up was easy,so far after about a month is woking excellent for my needs.  You can buy a Hi-res camera for the Chanel you really need to see detail on but the supplied cameras work great. Complete kit.would be 5 stars although manual not well written,how ever when i contacted them for tech support, they responded quickly and answred lots of my questions. Very professional.I would recommend this product to all who want little money for a great value.

ProductInfo.Features:
H.264 Compression Technology
Internet and 3G Mobile Phone access (IPhone, Blackberry, Android, Nokia Symbian, Windows Mobile)
CE mark, FCC (Federal Communications Commission), RoHS Standard
ProductInfo.Name: Q1C1 High End Internet & 3G Phone Accessibe 4 CH Channel CCTV Surveillance Security DVR 4x IR Night Vision Camera System Kit No Hard Drive Installed, (Monitor not Included)
